{"id":1397955165,"question_id":724,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1726971817,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1397955165/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"36 MB","code":"/*\nGiven an array of integers nums, calculate the pivot index of this array.\nThe pivot index is the index where the sum of all the numbers strictly to the left of the index is equal to the sum of all the numbers strictly to the index's right.\nIf the index is on the left edge of the array, then the left sum is 0 because there are no elements to the left. This also applies to the right edge of the array.\nReturn the leftmost pivot index. If no such index exists, return -1.\n1 <= nums.length <= 104\n-1000 <= nums[i] <= 1000\n*/\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> leftSum(n, 0);\n        leftSum[0] = 0;\n        vector<int> rightSum(n, 0);     \n        rightSum[n-1] = 0;\n\n        for(int i=1; i<n; i++) {\n            leftSum[i] = leftSum[i-1]+nums[i-1];\n        };\n        for(int i=n-2; i>=0; i--) {\n             rightSum[i] = rightSum[i+1]+nums[i+1];\n        };\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            if(leftSum[i] == rightSum[i])\n                return i;\n        };\n        return -1;  \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
